name: d3-voronoi-map
description: D3 plugin which computes a map (one-level treemap), based on Voronoi tesselation
author: Kcnarf <fl.franck.lebeau@gmail.com>

scripts.pretest: yarn run build && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/flickering-mitigation.js -- ./src/flickering-mitigation.js && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/initial-weight-policies/half-average-area.js -- ./src/initial-weight-policies/half-average-area.js && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/initial-position-policies/random.js -- ./src/initial-position-policies/random.js && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/initial-position-policies/pie.js -- ./src/initial-position-policies/pie.js
scripts.precommit: yarn run test && uglifyjs build/d3-voronoi-map.js -c -m -o build/d3-voronoi-map.min.js
scripts.preversion: yarn run precommit && zip -j build/d3-voronoi-map.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-voronoi-map.js build/d3-voronoi-map.min.js
